Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui

Class ControllerGuiInterface

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.ControllerGuiInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseController, DashboardController, EndGameController, InitialController, InitialResController, IntermediateController, LobbyController, MarketController, PrivateLoginController, PublicLoginController, SingleLoginController, StartController, WaitingController
public abstract class ControllerGuiInterface
extends java.lang.Object
Controller Gui interface Abstract class, each JavaFx controller inherits from this class in order to be managed by GUI class Each class that inherits must have an unique static attribute className of type String *
